"Maybe, who knows. We'll grow old together. Do you like children?" Airbombe=
r asked.

"Yes! Let's go!" Sinister said. He started walking faster...
  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:45 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Blizzard=
/Infectra

  *Blizzard smiles*

  Blizzard: Okay, let's hurry so we don't m=
iss anything else like maybe a nice battle.

  *Blizzard says to Sinister*
=



  *Infectra smiles when Airbomber hugs her. She didn't think love could =
happen so sudden and fast*

  Infectra: There are probably tones of Maximal=
s in there going on with lifes pretending we're not here.

  *infectra says=
 and than grins*

  Infectra: If we wait long enough then we'll get to play=
 in the leaves and snow and than relax in the sun.

  *Infectra says joking=
 wondering when someone will notice them*


    ----- Original Message ----=
- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August =
04, 2000 4:48 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    "I don't know, let's go back th=
ere, now." Sinister said to Blizzard.

    Airbomber watched Stranato runni=
ng around and calling out. He laughed.

    "Stranato better get some help,=
 otherwise be might become a 'heel' again." Airbomber said. He smiled and h=
ugged Infectra, he never felt this way about a girl before....
      ----- =
Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
      Subject: Re: NBW
=


      Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



      *Twister looks at the sword and =
sighs*

      Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact that, my sister ha=
s a life too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....

      *Twister sig=
hs and slowly and gentley places the energon eagles into her arm compartmen=
t*


      *Blizzard looks at Sinister and smiles*

      Blizzard: I wonde=
r what's happening back at the base.



      *Infectra smiles back at Airb=
omber*

      Infectra: I trust the both of you......I did trust the others=
 but....

      *Infectra sighs*

      Infectra: I need to stop thinking o=
f things that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the good times because t=
here were hardly none.

      *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*


    =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
        Subject=
: Re: NBW


        Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

      =
  "He left this here, without it, what shall he do? We have simular problem=
s. I just wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

     =
   Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes=
.

        Stranato calls out.

        "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells =
through the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

  =
      "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the occ=
urences happening. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he =
hasn't always been good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He=
 laughed at his words...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          =
From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Th=
ursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
          Subject: Re: NBW


          Twi=
ster/Blizzard/Infectra



          *Twister looks at Sinesis*

          T=
wister: I've decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister and I love h=
er too much to pull her away from the she loves....

          *Twister ope=
ns her arm compartment and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both sha=
ped like an eagle*

          Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unit=
e us as sisters and friends forever and always help each other. I found Bli=
zzard's on the ground in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by accid=
ent.....

          *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



       =
   (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

          *Bli=
zzard skips out of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultima =
Base and holds her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



         =
 *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


        =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
 =
           Subject: Re: NBW


            Sinesis sighs and stares at Twist=
er. (Sorry about earlier.)

            Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar=
 walking toward the Maximal base.

            "Where are you going? And ca=
n I come?" Sinister asked.

            Stranato and Airbomber stop at the =
Maximal base, since they were never set on enemy and never betrayed the Max=
imals, they went on in...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
         From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
         Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
              Subject: Re:=
 NBW


              Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


              *Infec=
tra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*



           =
   *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits =
his repairs*



              *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave =
walks next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards =
his wanting to hold hands with him*



              (OOC: Twister is out n=
ear the Maximal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

              *=
Twister leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was =
else where and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as=
 Sinesis*

              Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I en=
d up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sis=
ter could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such hap=
piness could happen.....

              *Twister puts her double sided swor=
d away stares at the table*


                ----- Original Message ----- =

                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
             Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                Subjec=
t: NBW


                Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal b=
ase.

                Gangon, still dying.

                Deemos and Inzo=
la confront one another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.
=

                Etchingar called out to Megatron.

                "Hey, d=
o I got the job?" He asked.

                Time Bomb waited patiently and=
 Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatro=
n.

                Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.=
) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.

                Sinesis was =
healed and sat down next to Twister...
